description: Google Bard is an AI-powered text generation platform that uses deep learning technology to generate creative and engaging written content.

input_output_examples.input: Write me a poem about the ocean
input_output_examples.output:
The ocean is vast and wide,
Its waves crashing against the shore,
A world of wonder beneath the tide,
Majestic creatures we can't ignore.

input_output_examples.input: Can you write a short story about a dog and a cat becoming friends?
input_output_examples.output:
Once upon a time, in a small town,
A dog and a cat would always frown.
But one day, they met at the park,
And their friendship sparked.
